data.title: Solange Knowles weds Alan Ferguson
data.meta_description: Solange Knowles, the 28-year-old DJ sister of Beyonce Knowles, wed Alan Ferguson, 51, on Sunday in New Orleans.
data.text:
Solange Knowles is a single lady no longer!

The 28-year-old DJ wed Alan Ferguson, 51, on Sunday in New Orleans, reports Vogue.

The bride's sister, Beyonce Knowles, and her brother-in-law, Jay Z, were in attendance.

"Everyone I worked with on the wedding are friends who I love," said Solange, who wore a dress by Humberto Leon for Kenzo. "Everything was a labor of love." (See an Instagram photo of her dress below.)

Knowles put her own spin on the affair, opting to ride a bike to the ceremony, which was held in the Bywater district of the city. After changing out of her ivory jumpsuit, she walked down the aisle to a symphonic instrumental of Donny Hathaway's "I Love the Lord, He Heard My Cry."
